column1: Special Educator, Care Giver, Sports Teacher, Music Teacher
column2: We are recruiting for a Special Educator/ Care Giver/ Sports Teacher/ Music Teacher for an adolescent individual who is neurotypical. The care giver/teacher will help the neurotypical individual through the journey of life and enabling him to have fulfilling life experiences.  Job Description :  1. A specialized Sports teacher/ Music teacher / Theatre Artist will be preferable.  2. The teacher must identify the strengths and motivations of the individual to achieve meaningful outcomes.  3. Regular training will be provided to support staff to equip them with the necessary knowledge and skills for facilitating positive and meaningful life experiences for the individual. 4. The teacher should aim to foster a culture of inclusivity and independence in their support approach.  5. Compassion, patience, and sensitivity are essential qualities for support staff. 6. The teacher should also possess qualities such as being fun, loving, and innovative.  7. Proficiency in English is required, as support staff will assist individuals with functional academic skills.  8. Job responsibilities may include supporting individuals with self-help skills and other tasks as needed. Preferred candidate profile:- Graduate / Post Graduate in Psychology or Post Graduate in Child Development or Graduate / Sports Teacher / Music Teacher Benefits: Access to Health Insurance Access to Educational Support Scheme Company pension contribution (including income protection and death-in-service benefits) Paid Maternity & Paternity Leave  Up to 20 days of Annual leave Training and development (CPD) Overseas candidate can be sponsored for visa  Accommodation provided

column2: This project aims to verify effictiveness of a specific Yoga module in reducing craving in tobacco dependent individuals who want to quit tobacco use. It includes administration of various psychological assessment tools before and after yoga intervention, for the patients attending OPDs (Rural community health and training centre, Mugalur Tobacco cessation centre and OPDs of Department of general medicine, pulmonary medicine, Cardiology Ent and dental surgery)at SJMC in St Johns Medical College and Hospital.               Experience:    Experience in teaching Yoga to patients, Exposure to integrative Setup, Experience in conducting research               Preferred Qualifications:    M.Sc. in Yoda Therapy/BNYS/ any bachelor degree with additional one year of Yoga teaching.                 Roles & Responsibilities:                   Teaching the specific manualized Yoga module to patients in a standardized way                 Efficiently scheduling the classes                 To Converse with participants in Kannada/English/Hindi                 To professionally interact with clinicians nurses and patients for sample recruitment                 Monitoring the yoga performance using relevant assessments tools                 Documentation and data management                  To notify adverse events                  Other project related works

column2: Skoolfi is looking for Physical Education Teacher to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Develop and implement comprehensive lesson plans for physical education classes, aligned with state standards and educational objectives      Teach students a variety of physical activities and sports, including team sports, individual sports, and fitness exercises      Instruct students on proper techniques for each activity, emphasizing safety, good sportsmanship, and fair play      Assess students' progress and skill levels and provide regular feedback to students and parents on their performance      Monitor and enforce school and district policies regarding student behavior and conduct, including academic performance and attendance      Collaborate with other teachers, coaches, and administrators to ensure that physical education programs are integrated with other academic and extracurricular activities      Develop and maintain equipment and supplies for physical education programs, ensuring that all equipment is safe and properly maintained

Ramagya Group is looking for Sports Coaches & Physical Education to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      We are seeking dedicated and experienced Sports Coaches to join our dynamic team      The ideal candidates will have a passion for their respective sports, excellent coaching skills, and a commitment to fostering the development of athletes at various skill levels      As a Sports Coach, you will play a key role in designing and implementing training programs, providing mentorship, and creating a positive and inclusive team environment        Responsibilities:        Player Development:Assess the skill levels of players in the assigned sport and develop customized training programs to enhance their technical, tactical, and physical abilities      Provide individualized coaching to address specific player needs and goals      Training Session Design:Plan and organize effective training sessions, including drills, exercises, and match simulations, to improve players' overall performance      Incorporate innovative coaching techniques to keep training sessions engaging and challenging      Skill Instruction:Instruct players on proper techniques, strategies, and rules specific to the sport      Demonstrate and explain advanced skills and tactics to help players reach their full potential      Game Strategy:Develop and implement strategic game plans for individual players and teams      Analyze opponents' strengths and weaknesses to create effective match strategies      Motivation and Mentorship:Motivate and inspire players to achieve their best both on and off the field/court      Provide mentorship and guidance to support players' personal and athletic development      Player Assessment:Conduct regular assessments and evaluations of players' progress and performance      Provide constructive feedback to players and collaborate with them to set and achieve realistic goals      Team Collaboration:Work collaboratively with assistant coaches and support staff to ensure a cohesive and supportive team environment      Foster positive team dynamics and sportsmanship among players      Tournament and Event Preparation:Prepare players for competitive events, including physical conditioning, mental preparation, and match strategy      Attend and support players during tournaments and events as needed
